tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE door_window_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    door_status BOOLEAN,
    window_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE motion_detection (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    motion_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE door_status (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    door_opened BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE window_status (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    window_opened BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_location (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE motion_detection (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  motion_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE door_status (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  is_open BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE window_status (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  is_open BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_info (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_name VARCHAR(50),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_activity_log (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  activity VARCHAR(100),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
